entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 p.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 5:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 11 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 6.7°C
Wind: ESE 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning and afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches in low lying areas before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
